name: Intro
_source: speak;Ephraim;The Grado capital...|It looks like it hasn't changed at all since the last time I was here.|Eirika and I came here once long ago with our father.|Duessel taught me the lance, and I studied history with Lyon.|I never imagined I'd come back here armed for battle.

speak;LyonF;...And so the hero Grado and his companions used the five Sacred Stones to seal away the evil of the Demon King, and his wicked soul was locked within the Stone of Grado.|The Stone of Grado came to be known as the Fire Emblem.|To this day, it's kept safe and honored as a national treasure of the empire.|...I think that's about it.|For more on Grado's life, read Founding Emperor Grado.|It's comprehensive.
speak;EphraimSepia;...It's so thick.|...And the letters are so small.
speak;LyonF;But you have to read it.|You don't want Father MacGregor to discipline you again.
speak;EphraimSepia;...I'm no good with books.|The problem is they don't move.|I get bored silly.|I understand so much better when you explain it to me, Lyon.

speak;LyonF;Yes, but...it's kind of weird to be helping you all the time.|It's just that I admire you, Ephraim.|I want to be strong, like you-brave and handsome...|I've got an idea.|Why don't you teach me to wield a lance, Ephraim?|I can't let my defeat to Eirika go unchallenged.|I look foolish.
speak;EphraimSepia;It's a deal.|We practice tomorrow, though.|If you want to beat Eirika, you have to take this seriously.
speak;LyonF;Just go easy on me, all right?
speak;Ephraim;Another tremor...|They happen a lot, don't they?
speak;Myrrh;Yes, I was startled.|Ephraim, this place...|Did it always shake like this?
speak;Ephraim;Yeah, Grado's been prone to earthquakes for a long time.|Tiny tremors like that happen all the time.|Don't worry.
speak;Myrrh;I can feel it-from inside the castle, I can feel the darkness.|I feel a broad pool of darkness deep within its walls.
speak;Ephraim;Perhaps it's coming from the throne room.|That's where Emperor Vigarde, the man who started this, is. Let's go.
speak;Lyon;Father...|Have we been foolish? When you died, I couldn't accept the loss...|I...|If only I'd been stronger...|Urgh!
music;48- Solve the Riddle Orchestral Cover;500
speak;SoldierRed;Your Majesty!|Enemy soldiers are headed this way!|Oh, Prince-
speak;Lyon Evil;...Hi.|What's wrong?|Why such an unusual expression on your face?|I'd rather you didn't look upon me as though I were some horrid beast.
speak;Lyon Evil;Did you say we were under attack?|I want all of you to strike the foe.|Bring your weapons to bear on Ephraim.|Is that acceptable, Father?
speak;Lyon Evil;Command Grado, Emperor Vigarde...|Destroy Ephraim...
